con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-registerForDirectDebit
con:testCase.con:description: Tests service with wrong and not allowed values based on interface specification: ...\src\trunk\SRs\Interfaces\PPIT\ST_TD_R16-4_DRC_PPIT_IFS.doc

con:request.name: 6005N_subsripManagement_registerForDD_customLimit-Wrong-Limit+Unlimited
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <cus:registerForDirectDebit>\r <msisdn>${#Project#MSISDN-chargeCustomer-OK}</msisdn>\r <externalContractId>${#Project#Random10}${#Project#Random5}</externalContractId>\r <multibrandId>\r <brandId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-BrandID}</brandId>\r <tenantId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-TenantID}</tenantId>\r </multibrandId>\r <bankData>\r <iban>${#Project#Customer-IBAN}</iban>\r <bic>${#Project#Customer-BIC}</bic>\r <bankAccountOwner>bankAccountOwner</bankAccountOwner>\r <mandateId>${#Project#Customer-MandantID}</mandateId>\r <mandateCreationDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current}</mandateCreationDate>\r <!--type: mandateStatusEnum - enumeration: [ACTIVE,INACTIVE]-->\r <mandateStatus>ACTIVE</mandateStatus>\r </bankData>\r <!--type: directDebitStateEnum - enumeration: [INACTIVE,WAITING_FOR_FIRST_DIRECT_DEBIT,INITIAL_RETENTION,ACTIVE]-->\r <directDebitState>ACTIVE</directDebitState>\r <customerParameters>\r <customerMonetaryParameter>\r <!--Test-Element: Either name + value or unlimited is allowed. Not both.-->\r <name>GENERAL_MONTHLY_MAX_AMOUNT</name>\r <value>${#TestSuite#registerOption.customerMonteryParam.MonthlyLimit-Default}</value>\r <UNLIMITED/>\r </customerMonetaryParameter>\r </customerParameters>\r </cus:registerForDirectDebit>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>mandateId is invalid. Allowed only - abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?:().,'+ -</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:drcFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>No valid data for request</originatorMessage> <errorCode>102</errorCode> <message>No valid data for request</message> </ns2:drcFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
